channel.title: Starting Point?
channel.description:
How do i change the starting point to Lumbridge courtyard? Like in real Runescape. I want in so the minute you log in, you pick your char look. I also want NPC's welcoming you to the server, saying like, "The owner is: (NameHere) and a big Duel Arena scoreboard which shows the server highscores.
Can someone give me this and tell me where to put it in client.java ???

item.title: Starting Point?
item.dc:creator: @r3d_th3m3 r3d_th3m3
item.description:
@r3d_th3m3 wrote:

[quote=“josh_eya_2oo8, post:1, topic:197222”]How do i change the starting point to Lumbridge courtyard? Like in real Runescape.
I want in so the minute you log in, you pick your char look. I also want NPC’s welcoming you to the server, saying like, "The owner is: (NameHere) and a big Duel Arena scoreboard which shows the server highscores.

Can someone give me this and tell me where to put it in client.java ???[/quote]
You edit where you player starts in player.java
Search for the coords of where you begin
& change em.

Read full topic
